description.value: The skin of one hand is lined with a thin layer of sensors that provide information about an object at a touch. You can identify a creature or object physically in contact with your hand using the guidelines of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IdprCKGj66qptyN5]{identify creature} (Core Rulebook 133), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.76u4HnGcAlySicb4#identify-technology]{identify technology} (Core Rulebook 142), or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.HXcmgteT2OegqFrB#identify-magic-item]{identify magic item} (Core Rulebook 143). You substitute your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} modifier for the relevant skill modifier, and you can do this even if untrained. Having this augmentation counts as having access to an information network for the purposes of taking 20 on a check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.IdprCKGj66qptyN5]{identify a creature}.
